post.body: - 'night =)
- ooops, typo! Meant Put you on payroll..... Sorry, tired
- Awesome! Guess I'm gonna have to out you on payroll now... LMAO!!!!
- Nothing like getting HALF a conversation! That sounded really funny!
- Oh no... I may have missed it (I feel so RUDE!) TY for telling me...and TY!!! to @charlotte_seo I'll go find it....
- WOW! What a NICE compliment! Glad you are enjoying it!
- My customers can sell it WAYYYY better than I can! hahaha!
- If you want to know what are the "best parts" of One Week Marketing - ask here.....lol
- Take a look at it, let me know if you've got some idea and we'll take it from there. I'm ALL about improving it!
- Excellent! I know you're busy... just keep me in mind :)
- You should be pleased! You did a great job. Yes, serious....
- Now, do mine :)
- WOOHOOOOO!!!! Way to gooooooooooooooooooooooooo!!!
- Works like a charm ;) Not that I know HOW to play poker or anything....
and typos mean.... it's time to call it a day and get to bed..... G'night Twitterville!
RT @dentonloomis: Reading PotPieGirl's 6StepNicheSites... she could have easily sold it but gave it away out of the goodness of her heart!
15 Innovative Uses for Twitter from SiteProNews - http://bit.ly/qa3L
I just updated my Squidoo page: Help! Google Hates My Squidoo Lens!! Squidoo Help Center / http://tinyurl.com/67hpdw
RT @chriskellum: Took a "guru's" sales letter from >1% conversion ratio to 6.8% conv. ratio - sounds like a success! :)
